channel.title: The World - Custom Modified PI Base - Custom Server - New (ONLINE)
channel.description:
Hello i am Predicted.
I am from The World. This server was not coded by me, I am just the Owner/Hoster. This server is custom coded with custom items, and interface.
We have two worlds, But one of them is for staff only. We are still pondering on whether to open it to players.
As of right now we do not have a webclient. We have only a client. We are currently working on getting a webclient.
We have a website. http://the-world.4rumer.com/forum Signup to show your support/make an application for admin/Etc
I have made a video for the server here.
http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=dWD3Amz1yE4
I have also pictures to show you some of the server.
The home - http://gyazo.com/a3a06ca9417aa984ebb5543e85ab320e
Map interface - http://gyazo.com/b8618a406828a4509f8706125f07b8b0
Shops - http://gyazo.com/d74d787b04e71052cbcb118c21c01ff1
Staff zone if you are planning on applying - http://gyazo.com/9326dcfecada730d84321fa622df19b4
All skills - http://gyazo.com/081b36d53fa14b9cd7d5384a97807bad
Spin System - http://gyazo.com/b4ffccf0db4b1303fa344a1fa99e09c0
The video shows you the shops in-depth and all.
To access the server you can download our client and cache
Client - http://ge.tt/33uLWZm/v/0
Cache - http://www.mediafire.com/download/ni5u9klf3sfyw5f/TheWorld.rar
The ip of the server is theworldhost.no-ip.biz
If there is any problems in connecting post here, go onto the forums, or give me a ring on my skype Charlesrissmiller
If you do need help please provide information that is semi detailed.

item.dc:creator: @doggyboy doggyboy
item.description:
@doggyboy wrote:

Hello i am Predicted.

I am from The World. This server was not coded by me, I am just the Owner/Hoster.
This server is custom coded with custom items, and interface.

We have two worlds, But one of them is for staff only. We are still pondering on whether to open it to players.

As of right now we do not have a webclient. We have only a client. We are currently working on getting a webclient.

We have a website.

the-world.4rumer.com

The-World

Power United As One We Stand The-World


Signup to show your support/make an application for admin/Etc

I have made a video for the server here.

I have also pictures to show you some of the server.

The home - http://gyazo.com/a3a06ca9417aa984ebb5543e85ab320e

Map interface - http://gyazo.com/b8618a406828a4509f8706125f07b8b0

Spin System - http://gyazo.com/b4ffccf0db4b1303fa344a1fa99e09c0

The video shows you the shops in-depth and all.

To access the server you can download our client and cache

Client - http://ge.tt/33uLWZm/v/0

Cache - http://www.mediafire.com/download/ni5u9klf3sfyw5f/TheWorld.rar

The ip of the server is theworldhost.no-ip.biz

If there is any problems in connecting post here, go onto the forums, or give me a ring on my skype Charlesrissmiller
